name: Don't Skip the Music
description:
FEEL THE BEAT!

For the very first time, a game where you have to avoid things!! DSTM is a rhythm game where you will feel like a true runner! 

Help Remi to get out of his phone by running through the songs on his music player. Easy to play, hard to master. Follow the beat of awesome songs. 

Play anywhere on our Android Build coming soon! Fight enemies, collect notes and unlock more songs! 

Controls: Q/Left Arrow = Left Lane 

W/Down Arrow = Center Lane 

E/Right Arrow = Right Lane 

P/Space for jumping. 

L/Left Shift for slide. 

This game is currently in development, if you have any feedback let us know bellow, we hear you!

Credits:
